biotools.summary: Boltzmann Time Warping (BTW) computes time warping distances and Boltzmann' pair probabilities for a  given input gene expression time series.  This tool helps to identify genes that may share similar expression patterns over time.

bioschemas.name: BTW
bioschemas.summary: Boltzmann Time Warping (BTW) computes time warping distances and Boltzmann' pair probabilities for a  given input gene expression time series.  This tool helps to identify genes that may share similar expression patterns over time.
